title: Liqwid V3: Aiken, open source, open batching, ultra-fast
summary: Liqwid V2 has more active loans than all other Cardano lending protocols combined with clear product market fit yet suffers from UTxO contention that hinders its potential sub-second transaction speed
solution: Liqwid V3 built with an open batching system that fully removes UTxO contention and enables the protocol to achieve ultra-fast transaction confirmation speeds.
proposer_relevant_experience: The full Liqwid Labs core team can be found on our website including links to publicly available LinkedIn profiles: [https://liqwid\.finance/team](https://liqwid.finance/team)

fields.title: Campaign Category
fields.description: Determine the eligibility of the proposal for this category

sub_fields.title: Category Questions
sub_fields.description: Answer the following questions to determine the eligibility of your proposal.

sub_fields.title: Describe what makes your idea innovative compared to what has been previously launched in the market (whether by you or others).
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer: Liqwid V3 will build upon the clear product market fit acheived with the launch of Liqwid V2 by building smart contracts in Aiken as opposed to Plutarch, open sourcing the on-chain and off-chain codebases before mainnet deployment and hosting a high value bug bounty progam to incentivize Cardano Aiken developers to help secure the smart contracts.

sub_fields.title: Describe what your prototype or MVP will demonstrate, and where it can be accessed.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer: Liqwid V3 prototype will be released following the round of smart contract security audits and demonstrate the speed of an Aiken built lending protocol with an open batching system and UTxO contention removal paired with a fully pooled Aave V3 style money market. To date Cardano has no lending protocol which has built this solution.

sub_fields.title: Describe realistic measures of success, ideally with on-chain metrics.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer: The measure of success for any lending protocol is the active loans value and total value locked. Liqwid V2 leads all Cardano lending protocols in both categories and with the enhancements built into V3 it's expected that total borrows can achieve potentially 2-3x the current active loans on V2 within it's first 12 months on mainnet.

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer: Liqwid V3 is the evolution of the Liqwid protocol leveraging Aiken smart contracts and current on-chain transaction design patterns. Liqwid Labs contracted by the Liqwid DAO Association is developing V3 to harness the full set of lessons learned since the initial mainnet launch to deliver a simple and resilient lending protocol defined by good user experience, high security and low costs. Enabling a seamless developer integration is also a core component of V3.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
The positive impacts of Liqwid V3 include:

1. Developing an efficient and resilient lend-borrow protocol using Aiken smart contracts.
2. Building Liqwid V3 with protocol upgradability in mind to enable future support for on-chain features such as those currently still in the Cardano Improvement Proposal (CIP) development process.
3. Innovating on the current Liqwid V2 protocol feature set which itself has achieved significant product market fit defined by more active loans than all other Cardano DeFi lending protocols combined.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer: Liqwid Labs core team has built the only Cardano lending protocol to achieve feature parity with Aave and other pooled lending protocols built on Ethereum and Solana and this is evidenced by the dominance in active loans Liqwid V2 holds and has maintained for multiple years.

sub_fields.description: What are the key milestones you need to achieve in order to complete your project successfully?

sub_fields.title: What are the key milestones you need to achieve in order to complete your project successfully?
sub_fields.description: The number of milestones required depends on the amount of funding requested. Please refer to the Guidance card on the right for details

sub_fields.title: Milestone Title
sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Deliver Liqwid V3 Audit Report

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Publicly accessible audit report of the Liqwid V3 smart contracts demonstrating the completion of testing for the on-chain codebase will represent a major milestone towards the ultimate goal to deploy the protocol on Cardano mainnet.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer: Acceptance criteria is defined by Catalyst project reviewers accepting that a proper smart contract security audit has been made publicly accessible and covers the full set of Liqwid V3 smart contracts.

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer: The publicly accessible PDF version of the audit report will serve as the evidence of completion of Milestone 1. The Liqwid Labs core team will host this PDF on GitHub and share the link to the audit report across socials.

sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Completion of Liqwid V3 bug bounty program

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Milestone 2 output will be the completion of the Liqwid V3 bug bounty program highligting any issues which were discovered during the course of the bug bounty program classified by severity level as well as fixes implemented to address them by the Liqwid core team.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer: A Liqwid V3 bug bounty report covering any issues discovered during the length of the bounty program including the issue or vulnerability description and the core team's actions taken to resolve the issue will serve as Milestone 2 acceptance criteria.

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer: Once the Liqwid V3 bug bounty report has been made publicly accessible across all Liqwid socials and reviewed by Catalyst project reviewers.

sub_fields.description: The month when this milestone will be delivered

sub_fields.title: Progress
sub_fields.description: Current status of the milestone

sub_fields.title: Milestone Title
sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Liqwid V3 Mainnet deployment

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Milestone 3 output will be the Liqwid V3 launch on Cardano mainnet culminating from the audit report and bug bounty program previous milestones. Once the protocol is deployed on mainnet the proposal close out report will be submitted to Catalyst project reviewers for acceptance.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer: The project close out report detailing the launch of Liqwid V3 on Cardano mainnet will serve as the Milestone 3 acceptance criteria. The protocol will be accessible to anyone on mainnet and all milestones will have been fully completed at this time.

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer: The project close out report will serve as evidence of completion as the V3 protocol will be deployed and accessible on Cardano mainnet.

sub_fields.description: The month when this milestone will be delivered

sub_fields.description: The cost of this milestone in ADA

sub_fields.description: Current status of the milestone

sub_fields.title: Who is participating in the project team and what are their roles?
sub_fields.description: Who is participating in the project team and what are their roles?
sub_fields.answer: The full Liqwid Labs core team can be found on our website including links to publicly available LinkedIn profiles: [https://liqwid\.finance/team](https://liqwid.finance/team)

sub_fields.title: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.description: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.answer: The 200,000 ADA will cover a portion of the costs required to build, test, audit the smart contracts and deploy the Liqwid V3 protocol on Cardano mainnet. The resources requred to complete this include 3-4 on-chain smart contract engineers, 1-2 off-chain engineers, 1-2 DevOps engineers, 1 frontend developer, 1 UI/UX designer, 1 project manager and 1 product lead. All resources are full-time Liqwid core team members who have been part of our team for multiple years.

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer: Liqwid V3 represents the first fully scalable and institutional-ready Cardano lending protocol built from a team that's shown clear ability to build a product market fit acheiving DeFi lend-borrow protocol.
